Name: Fearless Charge
Description: Fear only bring the weakest of men. To be fearless is to charge on even against the face of death itself.

Name: Glorious Charge
Description: Glory to those who brave the fear of death and charge onward to the unknown.

Name: Steady Charge
Description: Steady but not too slow will win even more races and battles.

Name: Frenzied Charge
Description: Mindless and aggressive make the most powerful charge.

Name: Devastating Charge
Description: What is a better objective of a charge aside to devastate the enemies utterly?

Name: Stampede
Description: Under the iron hooves and beneath the blazing sun, only the strongest can rise up again.

Name: Breach
Description: Breaching through the enemy's formation to crush whoever dares to stand at their front is the greatest achievement every shock cavalry troop should dream of.

Name: Cover Charge
Description: Risky yet safe. Shield at the front and no archer or spearman can halt your advance.

Name: Agile Charge
Description: Agility is the most important aspect of a charge. You do not really charge by standing still, do you?

Name: Dread Charge
Description: Oh great horror, what sin did we do to bring you into us.

Name: Leaping Charge
Description: Momentum gain from leaping can make any following blow a massive crushing power.

Name: Historic Moment
Description: There are not many events in the world that would be worthwhile recorded into a history book. The same cannot be said for this moment.

Name: Hidden Charge
Description: It should be practically impossible to charge while remaining hidden. And how can someone defend against such an impossible feat?

Name: Clumsy Charge
Description: Some troops are just not suitable for charging, whether it be because of their insufficient training or unsuitable equipment.

Name: Heroic Charge
Description: Just follows the hero, and everything will be alright. They become masters of battle by staying alive after all.

Name: Weak Charge
Description: A weak charge can often time results in total disaster. Exercise charging tactic for troops with this skill with caution.

Name: Slow Charge
Description: Due to the troop's equipment weight, its charge is much slower than usual and less effective overall.

Name: Charge
Description: An act of charging is often one of the most crucial turning points in any battle. A successful charge can deliver a massive shocking blow to enemies that completely destroy their morale, or it can be a total disaster that results in a retreat of the charge initiator instead.

Name: Reconnaissance
Description: Only the very best of plans can be created from the most thorough information gathering process.

Name: Graceful Evasion
Description: There is nothing more elegant than gracefully evading a blow from a brute.

Name: Spearwall
Description: Spearwall is a simple yet effective method to counter a charging unit. It is difficult to dodge an object when you are rushing at full speed, after all.

Name: Spearguard
Description: Due to the length of the spear, a well-positioned spear stance can already improve the defence ability significantly.

Name: Shieldwall
Description: What is the most common tactic used in the most disciplined troops by every world-conquering empire? The answer is always shieldwall. The key basis of winning the war is to avoid having the soldiers die in senseless deaths. The longer the soldiers survive in the war, the more experience in killing they become. And a more experienced soldier make a more effective army.

Name: Shield Turtle
Description: Defensive yet still mobile. This tactic is superb against approaching enemy armies that excel in range attacks.

Name: Shield Dome
Description: The ultimate defence tactic. This shield dome leaves no vulnerable spot for an enemy to attack.

Name: Rapid Shots
Description: Opportunity to attack is of the essence, especially for archers on a battlefield. The more arrows remain in the quiver equate to the less enemy killed.

Name: Rapid Attack
Description: Strike fast enough, and the enemy will never know what hit them.

Name: Rapid Advance
Description: Speed can often determine the fate of a battle and even war. Being faster than the enemy is never a disadvantage.

Name: Steady Aims
Description: The most important part of range weaponry is to hit the target. Arrows missed are arrow wasted.

Name: Steady Shield
Description: The art of defence begins with stability. No unsteady shield can defend against harm for its user.

Name: Victory Or Death
Description: Sometimes retreat is a valid option, but not for this time.

Name: Chain Attack
Description: Hitting all enemies at once in a swift fashion is not an easy feat. Extremely powerful skill in battlefield combat with no end of enemies to slay.

Name: Sweep Asunder
Description: Only the strong can sweep a large weapon so powerful that the blow can leave all those standing at the front asunder.

Name: Cantabrian Circle
Description: A manoeuvre that is only possible with the mastery of both equitation and archery. To attack even when moving is the pinnacle of warfare.

Name: Hold Ground
Description: "Hold your ground men! No enemy will pass through this place as long as we are here."

Name: Pikewall
Description: The deadly charge of cavalry was the domination tactic on the battlefield until the invention of the pikewall tactic. By simply having infantries holding pikes in line, an impregnable wall is created,

Name: Hidden Pike
Description: A nasty surprise. Who can expect a complete death trap in their charge to glory? Only fool fight a fair fight.

Name: Overdrive
Description: The limit can be surpassed. But careful your life will not be extinguished by your own limitation.

Name: Death Volunteer
Description: Volunteering to die is an act that surpasses natural instinct. To excess oneself to death for victory is either madness or complete devotion.

Name: Second Wind
Description: One more push to victory. Such a chance never come often.

Name: Bloodlust
Description: All stat +10%, stamina +10% for every enemy destroyed

Name: Critical Measure
Description: A critical measure must be taken for this crisis, or we will not survive.

Name: Camaraderie
Description: Should a task be too difficult to accomplish alone, a fine work of cooperation should make clear any obstacle.

Name: Cripple Strike
Description: Why kill when you can cripple the enemy and make them suffer for all to see.

Name: Random Throwing
Description: Sacrificing accuracy for speed can be beneficial if the situation does not permit taking time to aim.

Name: Joy Of The Barbarian
Description: Pillage and destroy is the joy of savages. And it is the best feeling ever.

Name: Sand Pocket
Description: Throwing sand to the eyes is a trick as old as humanity itself.

Name: Terror Strike
Description: Terror comes in all forms. Physical appearance is often the key. Even more so if it is impactful.

Name: Martrydom
Description: To give your life for the cause is the ultimate purpose in life. Surely God will reward you for it.

Name: Proud Force
Description: Pride is necessary for victory. Only those who believe in themselves prevail against their foes.

Name: Soothing Ritual
Description: My hand on your shoulder shall bring light to your mind.

Name: Whirlwind Strike
Description: The wind cannot be dodged, only endured.

Name: Arrow Shower
Description: Deadly rain that can blotch the sun for eternity.

Name: Poison Arrow
Description: The greatest tool of cowardice. Unleash hell to the enemy from safety and see them suffer.

Name: Heavy Arrow
Description: Arrow specifically made to pierce heavy armour. Less ideal for other uses due to its weight.

Name: Fire Arrow
Description: A fire arrow tactic is often used to ignite a structure, ship or siege machine. It is also used to inflict damage to enemy morale.

Name: Whistle Arrow
Description: Whistle arrow by itself does little to no physical damage. The sound, though, does have a superstitious belief attached to it.

Name: Curse Arrow
Description: Nothing is more vicious than a guided curse.

Name: Smoke Arrow
Description: Useful for either support or distraction but will last only for a short while.

Name: Fireblast Arrow
Description: Exploding arrow is nothing short of innovative engineering between the new and the old.

Name: Unwavering Resolve
Description: Never give up, never surrender!

Name: Heroic Resolve
Description: Always prevail, always resolute!

Name: Sacrifical Strike
Description: Sacrifice to accomplish the impossible. Or is it merely a foolish struggle?

Name: Sudden Fortitude
Description: A sudden burst of life will catch anyone off-guard.

Name: Indestructible
Description: Why attack something that cannot be destroyed?

Name: Iron Wall
Description: None shall pass!

Name: Focus Strike
Description: Focus and steady!

Name: Absolute Devotion
Description: God rewards only those that give absolute devotion to him.

Name: Provoke
Description: "Hey over here! Come and get me." *all kind of rude gesture*

Name: Double Slash
Description: Twice the slash, double the damage!

Name: Triple Slash
Description: Thrice the damage, triple the prize!

Name: Great Sweep
Description: “One great circle and the bodies will fall. No life shall be forgiven under the dying muttering.” Gasiernse Poem of Blade.

Name: Pinpoint Shot
Description: Waste not the arrows nor mind.

Name: Clear Mind
Description: Clear thy mind and the Lord will carry guidance to thee.

Name: Blade Dance
Description: The dance of death never ends. A man and his sword never part until the stage turn red from the audiences’ gore.

Name: Desperate Struggle
Description: Desperation to cling to survival in a crisis that may not be overturned. No price is too cheap to pay.

Name: Payday Imminent
Description: Nothing can bring joy as waiting for payday! Hard-earned money and reward are one of the meanings of work, after all.

Name: Final Strike
Description: Final breath in this world, one final farewell to the beloved enemy so we may meet together in the afterlife.

Name: Poison Attack
Description: Poison at the tip of a blade never fails to disappoint, especially for those who receive it.

Name: Purge The Infidels
Description: The villains of the peace must be purged. For true peace only existed in our lord’s guidance.

Name: Grasp The Opportunity
Description: There is always a possibility in every impossible lies waiting.

Name: Blood Demand
Description: Demand to be made. Or this tribunal will never end.

Name: Valiant Struggle
Description: History will remember this day of our valiant struggle!

Name: Ground Shake
Description: Those who have legs cannot fight effectively on a shaky foundation.

Name: Spike Burst
Description: Who would expect the ground they stand on to be their enemy?

Name: Deathblow
Description: These troops can muster their last strength to deal the final blow before they die. Death in melee combat will cause damage to the attackers.

Name: Faithful Fury
Description: Friendly to the followers. Faithful to the cause. Fury to the offenders.

Name: Armour Shatters
Description: Armour is completely useless before this strike. Even worse, any enemy that survives against this attack will receive armour shatter status.

Name: Heroic Counter
Description: Deal 20% of melee attack damage back to enemy when receive melee damage

Name: Final Drive
Description: Only a few are prepared to meet their end. Even fewer dare to confront it.

Name: Crack The Whip
Description: Work for your master, slaves! Nothing makes slaves work harder than the sound of whiplash.

Name: Silver Arrow
Description: Next range attack deals 100% and +100% damage to spirit, evil and demon squads

Name: Overpower
Description: A total display of dominance in strength. The weak shall always cower before the strong.

Name: Clear Insight
Description: The route is clear. Now only focus.

Name: Shield Breaking
Description: Render their faith in the protection of their lives shattered, and their will to fight will be broken.

Name: Battle Prayer
Description: Prayer for safety and victory. Preparing for the departure.

Name: Disrupting Song
Description: A song can soothe the minds just as much as it can disrupt listeners' focus.

Name: Collect Corpse
Description: Good flesh and bone never should go to waste.

Name: Devour Corpse
Description: All flesh can nourish life, especially if they are still fresh.

Name: Wail Of Death
Description: The deaths sing, all lives follow.

Name: Cleaving Strike
Description: Cleaving through bodies and armour with ease. A feat that is achievable only by the strongest warriors.

Name: Mark For Death
Description: Those who are marked will never know.

Name: Dominate
Description: Every mind can be changed. Submission is the natural process of all lives.

Name: Revival
Description: Return from death to fulfil their duty once more.

Name: Put A Bounty
Description: Every life has a price.

Name: Digging
Description: Dig down the earth, greater prizes are never above the ground.

Name: Into Insanity
Description: Crossing the line into the domain that no sane mind will ever glance inside.

Name: Healing Support
Description: You will be healed and ready to take up your arms to repeal the enemy once again.

Name: Swift Chant
Description: Magic chanting always takes time. A mage who can swift chant is considered to be a rare talent even among the learned.

Name: Fantasy Imagination
Description: The route is clear. Now only the body must accomplish what the imagination can fantasise.

Name: Aging Touch
Description: Ageing is inevitable, but what is worse one can do to others than escalate the process. The ability to turn a well-toned soldier into a weak senile old fool is beyond terrifying.

Name: Ashen Rising
Description: Rising from ash, the flame of life will never be extinguished.

Name: Silencing Glare
Description: A glare so intimidating that it leaves anyone in sight incapable of even producing coherent speech from fear. Devastatingly useful against mage units that entirely rely on their chanting.

Name: Deathshriek
Description: The voice of death instils terror no sight can ever achieve.

Name: Abyssal Hatred
Description: Next melee attack deal damage +1% per number of troop killed

Name: Flying
Description: Flying troop does not suffer terrain and height penalty while also can only be damaged by melee attack when the troops themselves attack.

Name: Floating
Description: Floating troops do not suffer terrain penalties but still receive height penalties. Moreover, the troops receive a melee defence bonus against enemies with no Anti-Cavalry and Anti-Flying.

Name: Stun Strike
Description: Stun the enemy so they cannot fight back. An effective solution.

Name: Sunstrike
Description: Blinding like the sun, such brilliance will be feared by all.

Name: For Ancestor!
Description: The ancestors guide us not only in the past. For now, we devote our lives to our beloved forebears.

Name: Malabel Igiela
Description: The great charge of Malabel cavalry may one day rest in a page of legend or history book, but today, let us offer condolences to the unfortunate victims of this charge.

Name: Charge Of Regret
Description: The only word to describe this momentous moment is regret. The regret to not being able to relive this same exact moment ever again, no matter how many times it gets replicated.

Name: Giant Rush
Description: A charge from giants can be count as one of the most devastating charge in history , it is almost impossible to hold position against such massive blows.
